title: What do you do with the leftover project cores?
body: I have 10 project cores left after they pulled the chests off the market. Any way I could turn it into essence?

replies.body: I have 24 to be disenchanted >.> I hope they open it soon!

Absolutely!  I don't believe it's been enabled yet, but per our[ project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide the plan is to allow leftover materials to be disenchantable.  I hope that helps clear things up!
